info.name: Semaphore API Documentation
info.description:
Semaphore API provides endpoints for managing and interacting with the Semaphore UI.
This documentation outlines the available operations and data models.

item.name: Begin OIDC authentication flow and redirect to OIDC provider

request.description: The user agent is redirected to this endpoint when chosing to sign in via OIDC

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Finish OIDC authentication flow, upon succes you will be logged in

request.description: The user agent is redirected here by the OIDC provider to complete authentication

response.name: Redirection to the Semaphore root URL on success, or to the login page on error
